title: Millionaires Shortbread
ingredients: ['For the shortbread', '225g (8 oz) butter, softened', '100g (4 oz) caster sugar', '250g (9 oz) plain flour', 'Filling', '120g (4 1/2 oz) butter, cut into small pieces', '150g (5 oz) caster sugar', '300ml condensed milk', '4 tablespoons golden syrup', 'Topping', '200g (7 oz) dark chocolate', '25g (1 oz) butter', '15g (1/2 oz) white chocolate']
